name: IIIIIIIIIIIITS GOLF!!
description:
This is a poorly made golf game for the exam in KIT107(?) at UTAS.

Try to hit the ball into the goal in the least amount of hits.

Click the mouse in the direction you want to hit the ball.
Hold the mouse to add power to the hit.
Press space to make time move faster for a short while.

https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle - sounds
https://www.kenney.nl/assets - tilemap/sprites

Features:

Ball aiming and shooting
Ball aiming line
Ball sunk
Ball reset
Ball stopping
Turbo boost
Divot particles
Ball trail
Music
Title screen
In game UI
Start and end of level text
